AmpScan¶

AmpScan is a Python package that provides tools that provides FE analysis tools that can be applied in a medical setting. These tools Particularly apply to the design of effective prosthetic sockets.

AmpScan is is still under active development by Joshua Steer.

Installation¶

The best option for installation is to build AmpScan from source. To clone directly from the gitlab repository, use:

git clone https://git.soton.ac.uk/js22g12/AmpScan.git

A pip installation is also available through test PyPI. However, this installation is likely to not be the latest version of AmpScan:

$ pip install --index-url https://test.pypi.org/simple/ AmpScan
